files.patch:
@@ -53,0 +53,1 @@
+#include "utilities/debug.hpp"
@@ -1375,1 +1376,3 @@
-      char message[jintAsStringSize];                                          \
+      const int add_len = 33;                                                  \
+      STATIC_ASSERT(add_len == strlen("Index  out of bounds for length ") + 1);\
+      char message[2 * jintAsStringSize + add_len];                            \
@@ -1378,1 +1381,3 @@
-          sprintf(message, "%d", index);                                       \
+          jio_snprintf(message, sizeof(message),                               \
+                  "Index %d out of bounds for length %d",                      \
+                  index, arrObj->length());                                    \
